title: Gravatar Usage Examples
content:
Gravatar Usage Examples #  Wordpress #  Edit your theme, and add the following code inside the functions.php:
function use_webp_public_service($avatar) { $avatar = str_replace(array("www.gravatar.com", "0.gravatar.com", "1.gravatar.com", "2.gravatar.com"), "gravatar.webp.se", $avatar); return $avatar; } add_filter('get_avatar', 'use_webp_public_service'); like this:
